info.official_title: A Phase II Study Combining PEGPH20 With Concurrent Gemcitabine and Radiotherapy in Patients With Localized, Unresectable Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma

identified_line.line: 1. Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form;

criterions.exact_snippets: Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form
Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form
Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form
Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form
Signed, written Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee-approved Informed Consent Form

identified_line.line: 2. For men and women of reproductive potential, agreement to use an effective contraceptive method from the time of screening and throughout their time on study. Effective contraceptive methods consist of prior sterilization, intra-uterine device, oral or injectable contraceptives, and/or barrier methods. Abstinence alone is not considered an adequate contraceptive measure for the purposes of this study;

criterions.exact_snippets: men and women of reproductive potential
agreement to use an effective contraceptive method
Effective contraceptive methods consist of prior sterilization, intra-uterine device, oral or injectable contraceptives, and/or barrier methods
Abstinence alone is not considered an adequate contraceptive measure

and_criteria.exact_snippets: men and women of reproductive potential
agreement to use an effective contraceptive method
Effective contraceptive methods consist of prior sterilization, intra-uterine device, oral or injectable contraceptives, and/or barrier methods

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Abstinence alone is not considered an adequate contraceptive measure

identified_line.line: 3. Patients with previously untreated localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma (unresectable will be defined as locally advanced disease or when patients cannot have or refuse surgery);

criterions.exact_snippets: previously untreated
localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma
localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma
localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma

and_criteria.exact_snippets: localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma
localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma

or_criteria.exact_snippets: localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma
localized, unresectable histologically confirmed pancreatic adenocarcinoma

identified_line.line: 4. Absolute Neutrophil Count (ANC) ≥ 1.5 x 109/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: Absolute Neutrophil Count (ANC) ≥ 1.5 x 109/L

identified_line.line: 5. Platelets ≥ 100 x 109/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: Platelets ≥ 100 x 109/L

identified_line.line: 6. Hgb ≥ 9 g/dL;

criterions.exact_snippets: Hgb ≥ 9 g/dL

identified_line.line: 7. Aspartate Aminotransferase (AST) and Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT) ≤ 2.5 x [Upper Limit of Normal (ULN)];

criterions.exact_snippets: Aspartate Aminotransferase (AST) ... ≤ 2.5 x [Upper Limit of Normal (ULN)]
Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT) ≤ 2.5 x [Upper Limit of Normal (ULN)]

identified_line.line: 8. Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN;

criterions.exact_snippets: Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN

identified_line.line: 9. GFR ≥ 30 mL/min;

criterions.exact_snippets: GFR ≥ 30 mL/min

identified_line.line: 10. Patient has no clinically significant abnormalities in urinalysis results;

criterions.exact_snippets: no clinically significant abnormalities in urinalysis results

identified_line.line: 11. Patient has acceptable coagulation status as indicated by a Prothrombin Time (PT) and Partial Thromboplastin Time (PTT) within 15% of normal limits;

criterions.exact_snippets: acceptable coagulation status ... Prothrombin Time (PT) ... within 15% of normal limits
acceptable coagulation status ... Partial Thromboplastin Time (PTT) ... within 15% of normal limits

identified_line.line: 12. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) ≤ 2

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) ≤ 2

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

identified_line.line: Must have maximum age of 90 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 90 Years

identified_line.line: Subjects must satisfy all the following inclusion criteria to be enrolled in the study:
1. Clinical evidence of deep vein thrombosis (DVT), pulmonary embolism (PE) or other known thromboembolic (TE) event present during the screening period;

criterions.exact_snippets: Clinical evidence of deep vein thrombosis (DVT) ... present during the screening period
Clinical evidence of ... pulmonary embolism (PE) ... present during the screening period
Clinical evidence of ... other known thromboembolic (TE) event present during the screening period

identified_line.line: 2. Any prior history of cerebrovascular accident, transient ischemic attack, or pre-existing carotid artery disease.

criterions.exact_snippets: prior history of cerebrovascular accident
prior history of ... transient ischemic attack
pre-existing carotid artery disease

identified_line.line: 3. Known allergy to hyaluronidase;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known allergy to hyaluronidase

identified_line.line: 4. Current use of megestrol acetate (use within 10 days of Day 1);

criterions.exact_snippets: Current use of megestrol acetate (use within 10 days of Day 1)

identified_line.line: 5. Contraindication to heparin including prior heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT), recent CNS bleed; intracranial or spinal lesion at high risk for bleeding; severe platelet dysfunction; recent major operation at high risk for bleeding; underlying hemorrhagic coagulopathy; high risk for falls; potential need for spinal anesthesia/lumbar puncture; active bleeding;

criterions.exact_snippets: Contraindication to heparin including prior heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT)
prior heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT)
recent CNS bleed
intracranial or spinal lesion at high risk for bleeding
severe platelet dysfunction
recent major operation at high risk for bleeding
underlying hemorrhagic coagulopathy
high risk for falls
potential need for spinal anesthesia/lumbar puncture
criterions.criterion: potential need for spinal anesthesia/lumbar puncture

criterions.exact_snippets: active bleeding

identified_line.line: 6. Women currently pregnant or breastfeeding;

criterions.exact_snippets: Women currently pregnant
breastfeeding

identified_line.line: 7. Intolerance to dexamethasone;

criterions.exact_snippets: Intolerance to dexamethasone

identified_line.line: 8. Inability to comply with study and follow-up procedures as judged by the Investigator;

criterions.exact_snippets: Inability to comply with study and follow-up procedures
criterions.criterion: compliance with study and follow-up procedures

identified_line.line: 9. Patient has active, uncontrolled bacterial, viral, or fungal infection(s) requiring systemic therapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: active, uncontrolled bacterial, viral, or fungal infection(s)
active, uncontrolled bacterial, viral, or fungal infection(s)
requiring systemic therapy

identified_line.line: 10. Patient has known infection with HIV, hepatitis B, or hepatitis C;

criterions.exact_snippets: known infection with HIV
known infection with ... hepatitis B
known infection with ... hepatitis C

identified_line.line: 11. Patient has a history of allergy or hypersensitivity to any of the agents they are supposed to receive (or to any of the excipients for those agents);

criterions.exact_snippets: history of allergy or hypersensitivity to any of the agents they are supposed to receive
history of allergy or hypersensitivity ... to any of the excipients for those agents

identified_line.line: 12. Patient has serious medical risk factors involving any of the major organ systems such that the investigator considers it unsafe for the patient to receive an experimental research drug, these can include New York Heart Association Functional Class ≥ 3, myocardial infarction within the past 12 months before screening, pre-existing atrial fibrillation, symptomatic COPD.

criterions.exact_snippets: serious medical risk factors involving any of the major organ systems
New York Heart Association Functional Class ≥ 3
criterions.criterion: New York Heart Association Functional Class

criterions.exact_snippets: myocardial infarction within the past 12 months before screening
pre-existing atrial fibrillation
symptomatic COPD

identified_line.line: 13. Patient is unwilling or unable to comply with study procedures.

criterions.exact_snippets: Patient is unwilling ... to comply with study procedures.
criterions.criterion: willingness to comply with study procedures

criterions.exact_snippets: Patient is ... unable to comply with study procedures.
criterions.criterion: ability to comply with study procedures

identified_line.line: Subjects are ineligible for enrollment if they meet any of the following exclusion criteria:
